title: Move
content:
The card is moved to a different area than the one in which it currently sits. If an area isn’t specified, you can choose to move it either along the way or within reach of a Ranger of your choice.

If a card moves to another area, any cards attached to it will remain attached to it in the new area. If an effect would move a card that is attached to another card (without moving that other card), the card remains attached and does not move.
